devdoc.author: belbix

acceptAuctionBid(uint256).details: Borrower action. Assume that auction ended.      Transfer acquired token to borrower

auctionBidSize(uint256).details: Return size of all auction bids for given position

bid(uint256,uint256).details: Lender action. Assume approve for acquired token      Place a bid for given position ID      It can be an auction bid if acquired amount is zero

claim(uint256).details: Lender action      Transfer collateral to lender if borrower didn't return the loan      Deposit will be returned to borrower

closeAuctionBid(uint256).details: Lender action. Requires ended auction, or not the last bid      Close auction bid and transfer acquired tokens to lender

closePosition(uint256).details: Borrower action      Close not executed position. Return collateral and deposit to borrower

delegateVotes(address,bytes32,address).details: Delegate snapshot votes to another address

getAssetType(address).details: Return asset type ERC20 or ERC721

getAuctionBid(uint256).details: AbiEncoder not able to auto generate functions for mapping with structs

getPosition(uint256).details: AbiEncoder not able to auto generate functions for mapping with structs

isERC20(address).details: Return true if given token is ERC20 token

isERC721(address).details: Return true if given token is ERC721 token

openPosition(address,uint256,uint256,add.details: Borrower action. Assume approve      Allows the user to create a new borrowing position by depositing their collateral tokens.

redeem(uint256).details: Borrower action. Assume approve on acquired token      Return the loan to lender, transfer collateral and deposit to borrower

setPlatformFee(uint256).details: Platform fee in range 0 - 500, with denominator 10000

setPositionDepositAmount(uint256).details: Tokens amount that need to deposit for a new position      Will be returned when position closed

setPositionDepositToken(address).details: Tokens that need to deposit for a new position

toRedeem(uint256).details: Return amount required for redeem position

AUCTION_DURATION.details: Standard auction duration that refresh when a new bid placed

DENOMINATOR.details: Denominator for any internal computation with low precision

PLATFORM_FEE_MAX.details: Governance can't set fee more than this value

TIME_LOCK.details: Time lock for any governance actions

VERSION.details: Should be incremented when contract changed

auctionBidCounter.details: BidId counter. Should start from 1 for keep 0 as empty value

auctionBids.details: BidId => Bid. Hold all bids. Any record should not be removed

feeRecipient.details: Fee recipient. Assume it will be a place with ability to manage different tokens

lastAuctionBidTs.details: PosId => timestamp. Timestamp of the last bid for the auction

lenderOpenBids.details: lender => PosId => positionToBidIds + 1      Lender auction position for given PosId. 0 keep for empty position

openPositions.details: Hold open positions ids. Removed when position closed

owner.details: Contract owner. Should be a multi-signature wallet.

platformFee.details: 10% by default, percent of acquired tokens that will be used for buybacks

posIndexes.details: index type => PosId => index      Hold array positions for given type of array

positionCounter.details: PosId counter. Should start from 1 for keep 0 as empty value

positionDepositAmount.details: Amount of tokens for open position. Protection against spam

positionDepositToken.details: Token for antispam protection. Zero address means no protection

positionToBidIds.details: PosId => bidIds. All open and close bids for the given position

positions.details: PosId => Position. Hold all positions. Any record should not be removed

devdoc.title: PawnShop.sol contract provides a useful and flexible solution for borrowing        and lending assets with a unique feature of supporting both ERC721 and ERC20 tokens as collateral.        The contract's modular design allows for easy customization of fees, waiting periods,        and other parameters, providing a solid foundation for a decentralized borrowing and lending platform.

getAuctionBid(uint256).notice: Return auction bid for given id
